name: Typical Jermy Halloween
description:
A Platformer where the player has to finish levels in a given time, for this he has a dash but surprise each dash takes time away from the remaining times to finish the level (made during the 🎃 Spooktober Jam 🎃).

All credit Theo Bensaci
